Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Eventually \E*ven"tu*al*ly\, adv. In an eventual manner; finally; ultimately. [1913 Webster]

eventually adv 1: within an indefinite time or at an unspecified future time; "he will understand eventually"; "he longed for the flowers that were yet to show themselves"; "sooner or later you will have to face the facts"; "in time they came to accept the harsh reality" [syn: {yet}, {sooner or later}, {in time}, {one of these days}] 2: after a long period of time or an especially long delay; "at length they arrived" [syn: {finally}, {at length}]
